description: Lists the CA certificates registered for your Amazon Web Services account. The results are paginated with a default page size of 25. You can use the returned marker to retrieve additional results. Requires permission to access the ListCACertificates action.

nested_items.name: certificates
nested_items.description: The CA certificates registered in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the CA certificate.

nested_items.name: certificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CA certificate.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the CA certificate.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the CA certificate was created.

nested_items.name: nextMarker
nested_items.description: The current position within the list of CA certificates.
